original_title: Danger Zone 4: Mad Girls, Bad Girls
overview: Jason Williams (Flesh Gordon) again plays Wade Olson the Harley riding renegade cop. this time Olson finds himself deep in the Danger Zone when seven angry women kidnap him and take him into the desert away from the law. Sex is their weapon revenge is their motive Mad Girls Bad Girls join them for a wild ride into the Danger Zone.
title: Danger Zone 4: Mad Girls, Bad Girls
